short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: sMeta - Manage advertising accounts easily and professionally

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Promoting additional tools
• View and manage ad accounts
• View and manage business accounts
• View and manage fan pages
• View and manage campaigns across all ad accounts

* Interaction with Ad Account Data Tables
• Sort data
• Filter data
• Search data
• Calculate data totals

* Advanced Features
• Export ad accounts and business accounts reports to Excel
• Share pixels with multiple ad accounts simultaneously
• View and remove hidden admins in ad and business accounts
• Bulk create ad accounts in business accounts
• Rename ad accounts directly on the table
• View spending information for all ad accounts over a specific period
• Pop-ups in Ads Manager and Billing Page
• Display comprehensive information, including hidden details about accounts
• Real-time ad account data updates
• Currency conversion
Partner genlogin and tiklite
